title.rendered: Leeds Bradford International Airport in Leeds West Yorkshire UK

content.rendered:
Leeds Bradford International Airport in Leeds, West Yorkshire, UK Address / Phone / Email / Location / Website

Address: Leeds Bradford Airport
Leeds. LS19 7TU

Phone: 0871 288 2288, Fax: 0113 250 5426

Email id: NA

Hours: NA

  Leeds Bradford International Airport Official website: http://www.leedsbradfordairport.co.uk/

Direction: View direction here

ICAO code: EGNM
